EmailTemplate.name: RE: Follow up from MBO Partners (1321397563.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Follow up from MBO Partners (1321397563.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Manish,
Thank you for the update! If you decide to take on a consulting project in the future and would like to work with MBO please do not hesitate to reach out to me and I will help you get set up.
Thank you and have a great evening, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Manish Rana [mailto:ranamanish@gmail.com] Sent: Tuesday, November 15, 2011 5:51 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: RE: Follow up from MBO Partners
Hi Nicolette,
Sorry, I found your mail in Junk mail.
I started on W2 and thats why I didnt call you.
Thanks.
Best Regards,
Manish Rana
Never Blame Any Day in Ur Life, Good Days Gives U a Happiness, Bad Days Gives U Experience, Worst Day Gives U Lesson. All Are Essential For Life, So Enjoy Every Day Of your Life. From: Nicolette Taylor [mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com] Sent: Tuesday, October 25, 2011 9:51 AM To: ranamanish@gmail.com Subject: Follow up from MBO Partners
Hi Manish,
I hope all is well! I wanted to follow up with you from our conversation regarding MBO Partners. I know you had expressed interest in using our services and I wanted to reach out to see if you had any additional questions. Any update would be great and I look forward to hearing from you.
Have a great day,
Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
